SELECT LEARN_NO, PROC_CD, PROC_YEAR, PROC_SEQ, USER_ID, TEST_DATE, STUDY_LVL, MODULE_ID, (SELECT MODULE_NM FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER WHERE MODULE_ID = T1.MODULE_ID)AS MODULE_NM, GAIN_SCORE, RIGHT_CNT, WRONG_CNT, END_YN, PASS_YN, TRY_SEQ, INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_BASELINE_LEARNING T1
